entries.start_convo_1: Yes? You have something to say to me?
entries.confused: I must admit, I am perplexed by your statement.
entries.start_convo_4: And which command or word shall I listen for?
entries.end_convo: Very well. When I hear you say that particular remark, I shall hop to it.
entries.command_reply_1: I need to teach you a command.
entries.start_convo_2: A command? What sort of command?
entries.which_command: Which command do you want to tell me?
entries.taming_toofar: You are too far away to continue taming.
entries.taming_fail: You fail to tame the creature.
